title: This assignment tests you on how to create string object and perform in build operations on strings objects like reverse a string, check for the length, etc.

questionText.text:
Given a String, Return true if the given String is palindrome, return false otherwise. A String is said to be palindrome, it is same if it is read in both the directions.
isPalindrome(“Hello”) → false
isPalindrome(“madam”) → true
isPalindrome(“Good Morning”) → false
Check your program against test cases below as a zip file. Submit your solution(zip file) when all test cases are passed
